verses.name: Acts 28:23
verses.text: And when they had appointed him a day, there came many to him into his lodging; to whom he expounded and testified the kingdom of God, persuading them concerning Jesus, both out of the law of Moses, and out of the prophets, from morning till evening.

verses.name: Acts 28:24
verses.text: And some believed the things which were spoken, and some believed not.

verses.name: Acts 28:25
verses.text: And when they agreed not among themselves, they departed, after that Paul had spoken one word, Well spake the Holy Ghost by Esaias the prophet unto our fathers,
